tvdb: Caleb visits Livvie, who resists his influence.  When he threatens she'll be all alone in the world, Livvie complies with his bidding.  Livvie leaves a goodbye note for Jack, who advises Alison to forget Valerie and focus on her future with Jamal.  Reunited, Lucy and Kevin try to uncover the identity of the person causing trouble around town.  Lucy's distracted when she receives a phone call- from Christina!  Eve meets Ian in the park with baby Daniel and he is able to convince her to trust him again.  She rips up the restraining order against him.  When their backs are turned, Livvie swipes Daniel from his carriage.
